briefdescription.para: Name of the program launched (excluding any path!)

detaileddescription.para: Name of the program launched, aka argv[0]. Original char* object.
Arguments to pass to MPI Init. Does not include argv[0]. Original char* objects.
Arguments are being ref-returend as the result of parse(..). Does not include argv[0]. Original char* objects.

Parse the arguments into ArgConfig. Re-assigns argc/argv to remove consumed arguments. On success the tuple will be {-1, ""}. Otherwise the exit code (which may be 0 if help was requested) will be returned along with an appropriate display message.
